issue.title: [Python] Support more filter operators on Hive partitioned Parquet files
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2422](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2422). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
After implementing basic filters ('=', '!=') on Hive partitioned Parquet files (ARROW-2401), I'll extend them ('>', '<', '<=', '>=') with a new PR on Github.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2422?focusedCommentId=16459586) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Issue resolved by pull request 1861
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1861>
